title: Hour 1 - Chris Mannix (05-13-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Chris Mannix (05-13-20)
description:
Chris Mannix and Dan debate who is more deserving to be on the top 75 NBA basketball list. Chris thinks Dan is down playing the triple doubles of Russell Westbrook. Dan ask Chris will there be an asterisk beside the name of this year's NBA champion.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
